channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Tata Trusts battle: Why Mehli Mistry, Ratan Tata’s close confidante, has been ousted
What is India’s military exercise that has forced Pakistan to close most of its airspace?
'Largest downsizing in history': Why is Amazon set to lay off 30,000 people?
What is the ‘golden age’ pact Trump and Japan PM Takaichi have signed?
Shreyas Iyer injury: What is spleen laceration? How dangerous can it be?
Grokipedia launched: Can Elon Musk’s AI-powered encyclopaedia compete with Wikipedia?
L’affaire Francesca Orsini: Indians apparently still cannot speak without the helping hand of a Western scholar
item.description: There ought not to be a debate over Orsini’s deportation; that there was tells us how structures of knowledge production still perpetuate colonial power relations.

item.title: How Trump-Xi Apec meeting is final chance to prevent a renewed trade war
item.description: The Apec Gyeongju Summit offers a platform for direct, face-to-face dialogue between the two leaders, enabling them to move past lower-level disputes and engage in personal diplomacy

item.title: No longer a geopolitical blind spot: Rising significance of Western Indian Ocean
item.description: The Western Indian Ocean is where security, trade, and diplomacy intersect. India’s sustained engagement, naval exercises, and partnerships with African littoral states demonstrate a forward-looking maritime strategy

item.title: Trump’s top-down Gaza peace plan has all ingredients for disaster
item.description: The proposed Gaza transitional government, to be headed by the former war-mongering British PM Tony Blair, doesn’t represent Palestinians

item.title: Peace in Gaza requires harmonising Israel’s existence with Palestinian demands
item.description: The endgame of the Gaza Peace Plan will ultimately hinge on whether it can reconcile Israel’s existential security concerns with Palestinian demands

item.title: Eighty years on, the United Nations faces a test of its soul
item.description: From Gaza to Ukraine, Sudan to Myanmar, the UN’s inability to prevent or even effectively respond to humanitarian crises has exposed its deepest vulnerabilities
